name: Pixel Survival (itch) (Dafovi)
description:
Juego de supervivencia inspirado en Tactile Wars, Don't Starve Together y Project Zomboid.

Sprites utilizados durante el desarrollo:

https://dreammix.itch.io/keyboard-keys-for-ui

https://crusenho.itch.io/complete-gui-essential-pack?download

https://mounirtohami.itch.io/pixel-art-gui-elements

https://merchant-shade.itch.io/16x16-puny-characters

https://heosphorus.itch.io/top-down-garden-castle

Assets externos:

https://arongranberg.com/astar/
